data.text: @DenneyJoel @AsherahSerpenti Sometimes you see something that just powerfully reminds you of someone - and a purple hamsa with a lotus flower reminds me of Asherah.
@Callanite Yeah, this Camelback is great! And it’s so cute, too! It’s so tiny and pocket sized. At some point I may need to buy myself a larger one of these, because I love it. Thank you!
@Laxpup @Callanite It’s even prettier in it afternoon light. 💜💜 https://t.co/eX2q6h6fws

@AsherahSerpenti You are so very welcome, Pretty Rose! You had those travel cups that turned out to not be spill-proof, and I told you I'm the queen of such things - so I hope you like Camelback as much as I do! And the cocoa is from my favourite local artisanal chocolatier XX
